mlflex.helper
Class MathUtilities

java.lang.Object
  mlflex.helper.MathUtilities

public class MathUtilities
extends java.lang.Object

This class contains helper methods for performing mathematical operations.

Author:
Stephen Piccolo

SmartDivide

                                 double denominator)

SumBooleans

public static double SumBooleans(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Boolean> values)
Calculates the sum of a list of boolean values. When the value is true, it is counted as 1.0; otherwise, it is calculated as 0.0.

Parameters:
values - List of boolean values
Returns:
Summed value

TTest

public static double TTest(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Double> list1,
                           java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Double> list2)
                    throws java.lang.Exception
Calculates the 2-sample, two-tailed, t-test statistic for two lists of numeric values. This is a convenience method for calling into the Apache Commons math library.

Parameters:
list1 - First array of values
list2 - Second array of values
Returns:
T-test statistic p-value
Throws:
java.lang.Exception

TTest

public static double TTest(double[] array1,
                           double[] array2)
                    throws java.lang.Exception
Calculates the 2-sample, two-tailed, t-test statistic for two arrays of numeric values. This is a convenience method for calling into the Apache Commons math library.

Parameters:
array1 - First array of values
array2 - Second array of values
Returns:
T-test statistic p-value
Throws:
java.lang.Exception
